[[inst_c_bstart]]
==== C.BSTART

*Syntax:* C.BSTART DIRECT, label

*Description:* Compressed instruction variant (16-bit encoding).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_c_bstart.svg[C.BSTART encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* CMD

*Compression:* C16 (len=16)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"cmd_kind": "BLOCK_SPLIT", "note": "User corrected to A", "source": "group_rule", "uop_kind": "CMD"}`
